column.name: description
column.value: Instead of dropping below 0HP, drop to 1

column.name: description
column.value: You are both human and monstrosity. Spells affect you if they are for either

column.name: description
column.value: when an ally is in 5ft of you and must make a Strength saving throw, you may choose to have the affect target you instead.

column.name: description
column.value: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

column.name: description
column.value: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

column.name: description
column.value: You count as one size smaller when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

column.name: description
column.value: When using the disengage action, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement on that turn.

changeSet.author: mdbdba
changeSet.createView: select race, case when name like '% _' then substring(name, 1, length(name) -2 ) else "name" end as trait_name, case when name like '% _' then substring(name, length(name), 1 ) else '1' end as trait_orderby, category, affected_name, affected_multiplier, affected_die, affected_adj, affect, recharge_on, variable_recharge_multiplier, variable_recharge_die, variable_recharge_adj, description from lu_racial_trait order by race, trait_name, trait_orderby
